The files included in this directory were created by a third party. In some cases they were modified as needed.

The original sources are:

from_bioFormats: https://www.openmicroscopy.org/bio-formats/
from_ChanadayKavalali2018_pHluorinAnalysis: https://github.com/nchanaday/Single-vesicle-fusion-events
from_NoiseTools: http://audition-backend.ens.fr/adc/NoiseTools/
from_u_track: https://github.com/DanuserLab/u-track
other:
  InterX: https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/22441-curve-intersections?tab=discussions%2F1448063
  getComputerName: https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/fileexchange/16450-get-computer-name-hostname?tab=discussions%2F1494768
